title: Factoring Rules
text: Recall that $$i^2=-1$$, $$i^3=-i$$, $$i^4=1$$, $$i^5=-1$$, and so on so forth.
speech: Recall that  i squared is equal to, negative 1 ,  i cubed, is equal to, negative i ,  i to the fourth is equal to, 1 ,  i to the fifth, is equal to negative 1 , and so on so forth.

title: Factoring Rules
text: Divide $$86$$ by $$4$$ and rewrite $$i^{86}$$ in the $$i^n={\left(i^4\right)}^q i^r$$ form.
